title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 §§ 251-2.2 - Misbehavior report review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 §§ 251-2.2 - Misbehavior report review

State Regulations
(a) A review officer shall review all misbehavior
reports, which have not yet been reviewed, at least once on each shift. The review
officer shall also review the status of each incarcerated individual confined
pursuant to a misbehavior report under review within 17 hours of such confinement
and may order release from confinement where the act of misbehavior is ineligible
for segregated confinement. (b) Repealed
(c) Repealed
(d) Repealed
(e) Repealed
(f) Repealed

Notes

251-2.2

New

York State Register May 10, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 19, eff. 5/10/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
